bronze:SpreadShot.NAME: Spread Shot
bronze:SpreadShot.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

bronze:FullForce.NAME: Full Force
bronze:FullForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Repeat ALL bronze:Blasters.

bronze:CascadeBlast.NAME: Cascade Blast
bronze:CascadeBlast.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire !M! bronze:Core.
bronze:CascadeBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire !M! bronze:Cores.

bronze:ShockCore.NAME: Shock Core
bronze:ShockCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E].

bronze:SeerCore.NAME: Seer Core
bronze:SeerCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Scry !M!. NL Gain [E]. NL Draw 1 card.

bronze:BoomerangBolt.NAME: Boomerang Bolt
bronze:BoomerangBolt.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1.

bronze:DeferProcess.NAME: Defer Process
bronze:DeferProcess.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Next turn, gain [E].

bronze:StackOverflow.NAME: Stack Overflow
bronze:StackOverflow.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Shield. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Core.
bronze:StackOverflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Shield. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Core.

bronze:HeldProtector.NAME: Held Protector
bronze:HeldProtector.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL bronze:Burnout. NL If bronze:Fired: Gain 1 Artifact.
bronze:HeldProtector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL If bronze:Fired: Gain 1 Artifact.

bronze:Barrage.NAME: Barrage
bronze:Barrage.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster.

bronze:PrepareGuns.NAME: Prepare Guns
bronze:PrepareGuns.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each bronze:Blaster stored. NL Exhaust.

bronze:ShiningCore.NAME: Shining Core
bronze:ShiningCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Gain [E]. NL If bronze:Fired: Stun the enemy for 1 turn.

bronze:QuadCore.NAME: Quad Core
bronze:QuadCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Gain [E]. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].
bronze:QuadCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Gain [E]. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].

bronze:Subroutine.NAME: Subroutine
bronze:Subroutine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next card you bronze:Fire costs 0.

bronze:PrepDefense.NAME: Prepare Defense
bronze:PrepDefense.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Reserve *Guard into your hand.

bronze:ReserveGuard.NAME: Reserve Guard
bronze:ReserveGuard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Shield. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Goto.NAME: Goto
bronze:Goto.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL bronze:Fire the top card of your draw pile.

bronze:LockOn.NAME: Lock-On
bronze:LockOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster.

bronze:DupeCore.NAME: Dupe Core
bronze:DupeCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Gain [E]. NL The next card you bronze:Fire is bronze:Repeated.
bronze:DupeCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Gain [E]. NL The next card you bronze:Fire is bronze:Repeated.

bronze:SuppressiveFire.NAME: Suppressive Fire
bronze:SuppressiveFire.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL If bronze:Fired: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

bronze:AutoTurret.NAME: Auto-Turret
bronze:AutoTurret.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, bronze:Repeat X *Peashooters.
bronze:AutoTurret.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Refund 1. NL At the start of your turn, bronze:Repeat X *Peashooters.

bronze:TriBeam.NAME: Tri-Beam
bronze:TriBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Fire 2 bronze:Blasters.

bronze:MentalMap.NAME: Mental Map
bronze:MentalMap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M!. NL Return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.

bronze:Blockblast.NAME: Blockblast
bronze:Blockblast.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Shield.

bronze:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
bronze:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength.

bronze:Flail.NAME: Flail
bronze:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

bronze:SuperDuperBeam.NAME: Super Duper Beam
bronze:SuperDuperBeam.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put !M! *Void on top of your draw pile.

bronze:ForwardsDeclaration.NAME: Forwards Declaration
bronze:ForwardsDeclaration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry 1. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

bronze:Overcharge.NAME: Overcharge
bronze:Overcharge.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Strength. NL Gain X Dexterity.
bronze:Overcharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 Strength. NL Gain X+1 Dexterity.

bronze:ArrayShot.NAME: Array Shot
bronze:ArrayShot.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each stored bronze:Blaster.

bronze:Bug.NAME: Bug
bronze:Bug.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Gain [E]. NL bronze:Fire 1 random bronze:Blaster, bronze:Shield or bronze:Core.
bronze:Bug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Gain [E]. NL bronze:Fire 1 random bronze:Blaster, bronze:Shield or bronze:Core. NL Gain !B! Block.

bronze:DrainingPulse.NAME: Draining Pulse
bronze:DrainingPulse.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

bronze:Gatling.NAME: Gatling
bronze:Gatling.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a bronze:Blaster, gain 1 temporary Strength.

bronze:MechanicalMonster.NAME: Mechanical Monster
bronze:MechanicalMonster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card's damage this turn.

bronze:ReflectionHacks.NAME: Reflection Hacks
bronze:ReflectionHacks.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL bronze:Burnout. NL bronze:Fire 1 card in your discard pile.
